It is fast, easy to use, and will always be free. Best of all, you don’t have to install any software. To start editing your images, upload a single image to the upload box above. We currently support the following image editing functions: Resize image, crop, convert and other basic image editing.</p></div><div class="twoSections"><div class="section"><h2>Resize Image</h2><p>Upload and choose a new size for your image. You can choose a percentage of the original size or specify exact pixel dimensions. Resizing your images allows them to be displayed without stretching.</p></div><div class="section"><h2>Online Image Editor</h2><p>With our image editor, you can perform the following actions: crop photo, flip and rotate an image, or add image filters.
